title: Identify Tax-Loss Harvesting Opportunities
description: An advisor wants to identify opportunities to sell securities at a loss to offset capital gains for a client.

tasks.description: Scan the client's portfolio for positions with unrealized losses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies three holdings that are currently valued below their purchase price.

tasks.description: Check for any wash sale rule violations if these positions were sold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that selling these positions would not violate the wash sale rule.

tasks.description: Present the list of potential tax-loss harvesting trades to the advisor for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, actionable list of securities to sell for tax purposes.
